QuestData.Title: Distract Them for Me
QuestData.Description: There are three candidates for Ascendancy that we need to eliminate: Dame Alys Finnsson, Master Klem, and Mia the Rose.$B$BI'd like for you to serve as my distraction. When the time is right, I'll step in and finish them off from behind.$B$BWhatever you do, $n, do not underestimate them. Each got to where they are by being ruthless and very good at what they do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Dame Alys Finnsson, Master Klem, and Mia the Rose.
QuestData.RewardText: That takes care of most of their leaders outside of the Bastion of Twilight.$B$BWe work well together, $n.
